section.p: Suppose you want to work as a freelancer and you have the intention to do this only if you can earn at least $ 5000,- per month. You get a commission of 7.8% for each project.

ol.li: Create a model in a worksheet in which you can enter the total sales and the percentage of commission. Calculate the commission.
Determine through Goal Seek the total sales that must be made to get a commission of $ 5000.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create two input cells: commission percentage and total sales. Calculate in another cell the commission amount with the formula = commission_percentage * total_sales.
Choose tab Data What-If Analysis (group Data Tools) Goal Seek .
The cell to set is the cell with the commission amount., to value 5000, by changing the cell with the total sales.
